Articles.Content: Anyone here know where i can get a badass signature(banner) and avatar to use on the forums? Obviously i want it to be KSP related. I have absolutely 0 artistic abilities in the graphical department. If anyoen can help i will give you a kookie. ;P

Anyone here know where i can get a badass signature(banner) and avatar to use on the forums? Obviously i want it to be KSP related. I have absolutely 0 artistic abilities in the graphical department. If anyoen can help i will give you a kookie. ;P

i have the same problem

and over the years google has been my best friend

Just copy paste my signature to share some social meeting places for KSP and addon heaven

For avatar, use this: http://iamkoream.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/kim-jong-il-twn.jpg

How it's related to KSP? The dark side of Kearth is owned by North Korea.

I took your suggestion on the avatar. It works out especially well seeing as most of my rockets turn into ICBMs.
